message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?

Bob, I understand your position.  While $12,000 is the minimum I'm willing to accept, I'd prefer to settle at $12,500 to make this deal work.  This price still offers you a good value, and it's a fair compromise. Let me know if you're open to it.
